duties_responsibilities.duty: Assess the needs of patients in the Emergency Room and plan nursing care accordingly.
Supervise and lead personnel in carrying out the plan of care for patients.
Accountable for the quality of patient care delivered in the Emergency Room.
Modify and deliver age-specific nursing care according to unit scope of services.
Serve in the charge role, responsible for clinical and leadership functions in the Emergency Room.

education_certification.credential: Current license to practice as a Registered Nurse in the State of New York
